title: Circle of Death
content:
Circle of Death Level 6 Necromancy Spell 8~48 Damage 8d6 Necrotic Sculpt a massive sphere of entropic energy around a creature. Devastate the target and all surrounding creatures. On Save: Targets still take half damage. 18mCON Save Action Level 6 Spell Slot

Level 6 Necromancy Spell

Sculpt a massive sphere of entropic energy around a creature. Devastate the target and all surrounding creatures.

On Save: Targets still take half damage.

Circle of Death is a Spell in Baldur's Gate 3. Circle of
